PREREQUISITES

 - Installed Java Runtime <= 1.7 Run `java -version` to get Infos.
 - the `java` executable must be present in the PATH.

WINDOWS

Just double click `start.bat` and the program should run.
If you have problems, try starting it via the commandline.



LINUX/UNIX/MAC/...

Open a terminal and run `./start.sh`.

It might be necessary to set the executable flag:

chmod +x ./start.sh


OTHER

run `java -jar ./JMarvin*.jar gui.TUGLabyrinth`
